name: Baron Palms Resort Sharm El Sheikh

reviews.text: This was my 3rd trip to Egypt, this time with my 9 month old twin boys, partner and mother-in-law. Booked through Lastminute.com / Fleetway travel. 9 nights - £740pppn + £120 each for the sprogs.
reviews.title: Winter getaway

likes.liked: — The staff and service are what makes this hotel great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For what we wanted (to chill out and not do much) this was a perfect trip.
reviews.title: Best holiday ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We shared a 'family' room which was more than big enough for the five of us. Comfortable cots were also provided for the babies.
reviews.title: Love the people

likes.liked: — Comfortable bed and a very hot, fast shower. We also had two toilets.
likes.disliked: — There was no lift. To visit th lobby bar I had to push my husband's wheelchair all the way around the hotel.

reviews.text: The hotel doesn't have a lift, but then neither do any of the others in Sharm it seems. Maybe there's just a shortage of lift engineers.
reviews.title: Ok at the palms

likes.disliked: — A few bad members of staff

reviews.text: Anyway, a few travel tips:
reviews.title: A perfect holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Where do I start....
reviews.title: FANTASTIC HOTEL!!!!!!! Don't believe the negatives!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is fantastic value for money, we had a very warm welcome from the staff, taken to our large clean comfortable room with a very large double bed and single bed, balcony, 2 bathrooms, one with shower both with WC. TV, minibar. The room was cleaned everyday without fail, left clean and tidy.
reviews.title: IT WAS ALL JUST AMAZINGLY WONDERFUL

likes.liked: — The service and friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the full hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurants:
reviews.title: Amazing Honeymoon - BELIEVE the hype!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The main restaurant was alone fab, such a massive choice for all three meals, e.g. breakfast, all cereals, fruit, bread, cheif cooking eggs, huge selection of hot meats and veggi options, cheeses, salads, sweets. Lunch was the same with a massive selection and dinner too, waiter service for your drinks, buffett self servie for your meals in this restaurant.
reviews.title: Quiet and relaxing
Baron Palms A Place In The Sun To Be
reviews.text: Paradise Restaurant:

We have just returned from the Baron Palms Hotel on 20/11/2008 after having 14 days there. It is an excellent hotel, the cleanest we have ever stayed in you cannot fault them, they are cleaning 24 hours a day. The food is excellent and the beach, swimming, snorkelling is brilliant. It definitely deserves its 5 STAR rating.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Another fantastic holiday, this was our second visit and again we were not let down. Its the place to be if you want to relax, soak up the sun, see the fantastic coral reef, not for you if your looking for an action packed holiday. The hotal is spotless, service fantastic,very friendly staff, food excellent lots of choice hot and plentifull , no egyptian tummy for us! The staff even come around the pool and clean your sun/reading glasses for you, hows that for service!
reviews.title: Very relaxing

reviews.text: Have just returned home from the 5* Baron Palms Resort after a wonderful two weeks. The service provided is excellent. They can not do enough for you, we have really been spoiled during our time there. Everywhere you go is immaculate. A big thank you to everyone for making our holiday so enjoyable. The downfall was we had to come, but we will return. See you
reviews.title: great holiday

likes.liked: — welcome feel of the hotel and the great service given to us
likes.disliked: — evening meals were not 5* standard to me, too much the same for two weeks and not hot enough

reviews.text: all next year. Irene & Jean
reviews.title: Terrible service - Not a five star

likes.disliked: — Employees attitude. You are like a walking wallet

reviews.text: We went there last year and were quite happy. The employees lacked of experience but as it was new hotel (opened in 2006) we were understandful and all in all no big issue.
reviews.title: fantastic holiday

reviews.text: Just returned from a week long trip to the Baron Palms. By far THE best hotel i have ever been to!
reviews.title: Cannot understand any of the bad reviews...by far the best hotel ever!

reviews.text: The room we were allocated was great. We didnt get a pool view but that really didnt bother us as we werent planning on spending much time in there anyway. And the view wasnt bad at all out of the rear of the hotel. The beds were really nice and you could ring up and choose a different type of pillow if you werent satisfied. We had 2 bathrooms, both with a WC and one with a shower. Huge washbasins and mirrors. We had a double and single bed but seen as there were only 2 of us we didnt use the single. Really spacious with TV, free safe use, a refridgerator which was always fully stocked and ample wardrobe space. And although people claim that the hotel charge for water, this was not the case for us! They restocked the water bottles daily and we didnt pay for 1 during our entire stay. As long as you leave 2 bottles of water in the fridge (which are charged on the mini bar rate) you shouldnt have to pay for any. Complimentary dressing gowns and slippers were also quite sweet! Balcony was roomy with a table and chairs and towel rail.
reviews.title: Relaxation and Luxury

reviews.text: The room was cleaned daily to a fantastic standard! The cleaners were also highly accomadating if you returned to your room whilst they were cleaning.
reviews.title: Yet another great holiday.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area was fantastic. Although people do reserve sunbeds early, you shouldnt have any trouble getting a lounger up until about 10am. But the sun is up so early we were down there most mornings by 9am! Complimentary towels with the use of your towel card, just remember to pick it up when you give the towels back at the end of the day.
reviews.title: Super hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool with the waterfall is freezing through most of the day as it isnt heated but it was always good for a cool-off after a long sunbathing session! The smaller pool was heated and was a lovely temperature all day. The jacuzzi sections in this pool were also really nice. Both pools immaculately cleaned.
reviews.title: the best holiday we have had

aka: Baron Palms Resort Sharm El Sheikh Hotel Sharm El Sheikh
description: An enchanting location, rooted in timeless attraction; a pallet of colors: blue skies, red mountains, green landscapes, turquoise sea, and golden sands, are simple descriptions of this five-star boutique-style deluxe Hotel. The award-winning Andalucian-style with Moroccan design features Resort setup amid more than 150 palm trees, offers high-quality accommodation and a wealth of onsite facilities all combined to make it ‘A New Tropical Heaven’.
